Text: I really hoped this didn't include the Metro inteface... I would be perfect: the Windows 8 kernel and the windows 7 interface! Unfortunately, it's not the case.
Needs activation by a corporate KMS...curious to see if this can be defeated or emulated in a non-corporate environment.
@Grover NZ No daz 2.1.7 will not work. It breaks the server.

Use these commands at elevated command prompt to activate for 180 days (confirmed in VM of Standard edition)

slmgr /skms kms-c.no-ip.org:1688
slmgr.vbs -ato

Same method for Windows 8 Enterprise
Unfortunately the KMS server in Russia looks to have been taken offline http://forums.mydigitallife.info/threads/35379-What-are-the-options-to-activate-Windows-8-RTM-if-any/page101

i heard it was brought back online..

http://www.neowin.net/news/windows-8-rtm-leaked-isos-activations-now-blocked

can anyone confirm what everyone wants to know ?
Is the UI the same as other versions ?
So for example if people like myself hate the windows 8 metro tile crap does this work or look any better at all ?
Know what im sayin ?

It has the Metro UI like Windows 8, but not the store.  After login you are taken straight to the desktop rather than the start screen (tiles).  A little better than Windows 8 for Metro haters, but still no start menu.  Easy to add a third-party start menu though.

I downloaded this same file from Microsoft the 180 evaluation 3.4 gig datacenter gui. I called microsoft to get the activation key, it took 67 hours to get it. I installed this file on Oracle Virtual Box. I opened the powershell and typed:
Dism /online /Set-Edition:ServerDatacenter /AcceptEula /ProductKey: xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx

you must observe all spaces colins, and the work productkey does remain in the command.

The xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx, you must replace with a valid key

after entering this sting correctly with a valid key then re-booting yeild a valid copy without the 180 day evaluation watermark.

It will say Windoows Server 2012 Datacenter
Build 9200
Please provide me password I am from Nepal and the offer is not available in my country
